## TRACE Motion Standards

<!-- For reference, TRACE requires: -->
<!-- - Fluid motion with `cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1)` or physics-based timing -->
<!-- - No linear animations -->
<!-- - Smooth transitions that respect temporal perception -->
<!-- - Animations that enhance rather than distract -->
